cause.description:
Try and Stop Polar Bear Hunting and Try and Stop the Pollution of Oceans to Save the Endangered Polar Bears.
1. Polar Bear Hunting Must Stop
2. Governments Must Work Together to Reduce Pollution in the Oceans Which Affect Polar Bears
3. Reduction of Greenhouse Effect which melts the poles, home of the majority of polar bears
cause.mission: Stop Polar Bear Hunting and Stop Greenhouse Gases which melt the poles
cause.name: Save the Polar Bears
